Initialization.NonQueryStatement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS UserScores ( UserID int(11) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, Belief double NOT NULL, Version int(11) NULL, NumOfFacts int(11) NOT NULL ) ENGINE = MEMORY

INSERT INTO UserScores (UserId, Belief, Version, NumOfFacts) (SELECT u.ID as UserId, 0.2 as Belief, 1 as Version, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM UserCapitals uc WHERE uc.UserID=u.ID) as NumOfFacts FROM Users u)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ScoredFacts ( ID INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, Country varchar(50) NOT NULL, City varchar(100) NOT NULL, Factor int(11) NOT NULL, Score DOUBLE NOT NULL, Correctness TINYINT(1) NULL, INDEX SF_CountryCity_IND (Country ASC, City ASC)) ENGINE = MEMORY
INSERT INTO ScoredFacts (City, Country, Factor, Score) SELECT a.City, a.Country, count(a.ID) AS Factor, 0 AS Score FROM UserCapitals a GROUP BY country, city
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ScoredFactsUsers ( FactId INT(11) NOT NULL, UserId INT(11) NOT NULL, INDEX FactId_idx (FactId ASC), INDEX UserId_idx (UserId ASC) ) ENGINE=MEMORY
INSERT INTO ScoredFactsUsers ( SELECT sf.ID as FactId, uc.UserID FROM UserCapitals uc, ScoredFacts sf WHERE uc.City = sf.City AND uc.Country=sf.Country )
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RepKeyResults ( FactId int(11) NOT NULL) ENGINE = MEMORY

PerformanceCounter.NonQueryStatement: UPDATE ScoredFacts sf SET sf.Score = (SELECT SUM(us.Belief) FROM UserScores us, ScoredFactsUsers sfu WHERE sf.ID=sfu.FactId AND sfu.UserId=us.UserId)
UPDATE ScoredFacts sf, (SELECT SUM(Score) AS CountryScore, sf1.Country FROM ScoredFacts sf1 GROUP BY sf1.Country) cs SET sf.Score = sf.Score / cs.CountryScore WHERE sf.Country = cs.Country
